description:
Revelations abound as the true nature of the Wano clan and their relationship with the Minks is revealed! Momonosuke`s role is greater than any had imagined! But even more shocking - the visage of Raizo the Ninja!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Dritte im Bund! – Raizo des Taunebels!
Le troisième ! Raizō de la brume, le ninja, apparaît
Sanninme! Ninja Kiri no Raizou Toujou
The Third One! Raizo of the Mist, the Ninja, Appears!
三人目! 忍者・霧の雷ぞう登場
